thread.title: Sergeiy Sandler
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Sergeiy Sandler

author: Sergeiy Sandler
title: Sergeiy Sandler
text:
I'm administering a website hosted at eUKhost. We've recently had hackers do various forms of damage to the site. In the process of fixing the problems I've been in touch with their tech support staff by e-mail and by live chat (which is 24/7) several times a day, and I can say their folks are all incredibly helpful and patient, and always accessible. So, Sebastian, Magritte, Tomy, Vernon, Steven, Summer (and I'm sure I'm forgetting one or two of the people who helped me out by now): you're all doing an excellent job!
The live chat support staff have also been very helpful on any issue that came up in the past, over the 8 years or so we've worked with eUKhost.
